For painting in oil on taffeta without the oil running
You have to make a layer of batture, made of "colle forte" soaked for 24 hours in water then gently boiled so it is not too strong. After, stir in a little honey to soften it and bring it all to a boil. And on top of this layer which will soon be dry, you will be able to paint in oil, which will soften the layer even more, and which will also serve for a layer of gold. Alum water also keeps oil from running.
p010v_2
Layer of gold leaf on parchment or paper
Make a very transparent starch glue with little body. And apply six or five layers, and when the last is almost dry, apply your gold.
p010v_3
Cleaning gold leaf applied to iron
Rub your weapons or other gilt objects with dry horse dung.
p010v_4
Whitening ceruse
Boil some eggs, cut them in half and take the yellow out, and between the two halves of egg white, put a bit of ceruse, and stitch the two halves together with a thread. Then boil the stitched egg in some clear water and the water will become black and in this way the ceruse will stay purified. Some people cook it again over a fire and it becomes very white.
